original_text: And the land shall yield her fruit, and ye shall eat your fill, and dwell therein in safety.
korean_text: 땅은 그것의 열매를 내리니 너희가 배불리 먹고 거기 안전하게 거주하리라

sentences.original_text: And the land shall yield her fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅이 그 열매를 맺을 것이라

sentences.original_text: and ye shall eat your fill
